resources.string: Special thanks to my friends Ramana, Ajay and Rakesh.
•Users can learn about 50 states in the USA all at one place.
•Information about each state includes state flag, capital city, largest city, demonym, state websites, location on the map and other statistics.
•Most of the information is updated. Any changes would be reflected in the future versions of the app.
•Easy navigation to web pages and Google Maps™ if the user wants to learn more.
•User friendly interface with search functionality and swipe views.
•Home page of the app has scrollable list of 50 states along with a menu bar at the top.
•The menu bar has options to search, help and about the app.
•Search option helps to easily pick the states instead of scrolling.
•The overflow icon next to search option has more info about the app.
•Selecting a state from the home page opens the state page.
•State Page has data specific to state selected.
•Users can swipe left/right to view other states without going back.
•Users can learn more by clicking the underlined data in each state page.
•Locate each state by clicking Google Maps™. Your device should have the Google Maps app installed.
•Navigate back to home page using your device\'s back button or the back button on the menu bar.
•This app\'s design is optimal for phones though it works on tablets.
•This app is tested for bugs, crashes and consistency of data.
•Restart the app if it crashes and please do report the bugs to us.
•Consider reviewing the app, your feedback is important to us.
Disclaimer: All the information in the app is gathered from Wikipedia™ and other sources. We cannot guarantee the validity of the information found here.
